content:
ISearchIndexClient.TargetDifferentIndex Method

Definition

Namespace:
Microsoft.Azure.Search
Assembly:
Microsoft.Azure.Search.dll

In this Article

Changes the BaseUri of this client to target a different index in the same Azure Search service. This method is NOT thread-safe; You must guarantee that no other threads are using the client before calling it.

public void TargetDifferentIndex (string newIndexName);
Parameters
newIndexName
String

The name of the index to which all subsequent requests should be sent.
